about_the_game:
Get ready for a winter wonderland adventure with the new Christmas DLC for Bouncy Bunnies! This festive update brings a brand new level set in a magical winter land, complete with cozy cottages, sparkling snowflakes, and twinkling holiday lights.

As you hop and bounce through the level, you'll need to use all of your skills to outmaneuver your friends and be the first bunny to reach the goal. Take advantage of the boost pads to speed up your run, or use your double jump to soar over obstacles and reach the finish line.

Collect carrots along the way to boost your score. For the ultimate gaming experience, be sure to use a controller to fully immerse yourself in the game.

Invite your friends to join in on the fun by hosting a server, and get ready to race through the winter wonderland in Bouncy Bunnies!

name: Bouncy Bunnies - Christmas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce gtx 1060 3gb
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card
